issue.title: Logging definition provider should detail what instances are wrapped by CompositeDefinitionProvider

comment.body: To implement this _properly_ would require a method be added to the `DefinitionProvider` interface. That can't happen until we get to v3 to preserve backwards compatibility. We should come up with something that allows this but doesn't require adjusting the interface until we're ready to make a major release.

issue.title: Deprecate the ConfigurationAttribute and corresponding implementation
issue.body:
When it was first conceived the `ConfigurationAttribute` was intended to handle a unique case for a type-safe configuration object. In practice the limitations place on this attribute make it hard to work with. Realistically, we don't need to have a separate interface for this. A type-safe configuration can be marked as a `#[Service]` or libraries using Annotated Container can implement their own attribute type and extend `ServiceAttribute`.

> Note this issue requires adjusting code in cspray/annotated-container-attribute

comment.body: This should include writing a new Architectural Decision Record in cspray/annotated-container-adr
